alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Monroe; Morgan; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 12:47PM CDT until June 25 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Morgan County in east Tennessee... Rhea County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Loudon County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Meigs County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Bledsoe County in east Tennessee... Northwestern McMinn County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Monroe County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/. * At 147 PM EDT/1247 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rockwood to near Spring City to 11 miles northeast of Spencer, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dayton, Sweetwater, Rockwood, Decatur, Fairview, Spring City, Paint Rock, Peakland, Stinging Fork Falls State Park and Eagle Furnace. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 341 and 344. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 57 and 67. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bledsoe; Loudon; McMinn; Meigs; Monroe; Morgan; Rhea; Roane
